Text: Friday County Commission Redistricting MeetingI am forwarding a message from Rod Adair It is my understanding that Rod drew ALL the plans and does not back any of them as he cant considering his role in this process That makes sense Rod drew plan G which is the plan Frank Sanchez a Democrat directed him to draw I am still in favor of Plan C which puts the districts up for grabs to either Democrat or Republican That is the way these districts should be drawn It should not be a safe seat for either side The Commission will also vote for the Chairman Some are indicating that they will vote for Eloy Ortega who is a Democrat We have County Commissioners who are Republican and who is a Democrat Why should any of our commissioners vote for a Democrat to be Chairman The executive board of the Republican Party passed a resolution last Friday that we resolve as officers of the Republican Party to encourage Republicans who are elected to serve in public office to promte fellow Republicans to positions of leadership and authority at each and every opportunity As fellow Republicans in Chaves County we need to call and let our Republican County Commissioners know they should elect a REPUBLICAN to serve as chairman and leader of that board Sue County Commissionersphone numbers Harold Hobson Alice Eppers Jerry Wood Jimmy Craig Original Message From radair To Sue Gutierrez Sent Wednesday December PM Subject Re Friday County Commission Redistricting Meeting Sue I am in Albuquerque and just checked my email I need to make clear two things I do not have a plan It is not my role to do so I am not backing a particular plan Rod Original Message From Sue Gutierrez Date Wed Dec Friday County Commission Redistricting Meeting Im forwarding this in regards to the County Commission meeting on FridayI have talked to Rod Adair in the past about how he draws a district The way he draws districts is fair for both sides It makes a district available to a Democrat as well as a Republican and may the hardest worker win This whole notion of majority minority districts is offensive because it indicates that minoirities dont think for themselves and vote for the candidate or the party of their choice they instead vote in a block That means Democrats want minorities in a block because in their mind they do now and will always vote Democrat If that is true they are drawing lines in favor of themselves and dont forget Frank Sanchez is a Democrat Rods plan is fair for both sides Im backing HIS plan Im planning on being there Sue Gutierrez Subject Friday County Commission Redistricting Meeting If any of you can possible attend the AM County Commission meeting this Friday the st It looks like there could be some of the commissioners are in favor of Frank Sanchezs proposal which is outrageous in many ways Not only does it change district by leaps and bounds to the democrats advantage but why would they vote for this Sanchez Plan G over Rods plan C This is just opening the gate for them and Rod is the professional here not this guy Please go and voice your opinion and support to Plan C Outgoing mail is certified Virus Free Checked by AVG antivirus
